about_the_game:
Swords & Bones 5 is the ultimate conclusion to the saga. It’s also the most challenging chapter, designed to test the skills of veterans who have played every installment!
Take on the role of Basil, an apprentice archer transformed into a rat-man by a demon. You’ll be able to purchase enchanted arrows and wield a dagger to defeat enemies.
Collect power-ups and tackle new challenges in mouse form, with gameplay designed around hardcore platforming mechanics.
Gather all the Heroes’ Trophies and restore peace to the kingdom!

Features:

  • A new ability that lets you transform into a tiny mouse!

  • The final chapter of the saga, with unparalleled difficulty!

  • A revamped magic system using enchanted arrows!

  • A new story!

  • Improved graphics and sound!

  • Power up your hero collecting coins!

  • Over 50 action-packed levels!

  • 6 fearsome bosses ready to fight!

  • Two endings to discover!

  • Pixel-art graphics in 16-bit style!

  • An epic and dark chiptune soundtrack!

  • Achievements!
